description: Floor(n*sqrt(n)) - sigma(n), where sigma(n) is the sum of the divisors of n (A000203).
references: C. C. Lindner, Problem E1888, Amer. Math. Monthly, 73 (1966); solution by A. Bager and S. Russ, op. cit. 74 (1967), 1143.
D. S. Mitrinovic et al., Handbook of Number Theory, Kluwer, Section III.1.1.b.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 29 2000
